sense.def:
The probability of something happening
je ocena, kako verjetno je, da se bo nekaj zgodilo. Včasih jo izrazimo z ulomkom ali odstotkom.

seg.quote: Many people prefer mathematical probabilities to inspired guesses.
...a triumph of determination against all probability.

sense.def:
The probability that something will happen
je dejstvo, da se bo nekaj verjetno zgodilo.

seg.quote: The real source of his gloom was the probability that Kathy would not come.
The probability is that they will find themselves in debt.
